author: craigmcc
msg: Add a new lightweight API (org.apache.struts.action.PlugIn) for declaring
and configuring user application modules that need startup and shutdown
Modify the canonical /struts-example application to do its pseudo database
setup in a PlugIn instead of in a separate servlet.

author: martinc
msg: Add new <html:optionsCollection> tag, as discussed last November.
I don't particularly like the tag name, but I couldn't think of anything

author: cedric
msg: Remove some dependancies to avoid multiple compilations.
